<h3> Snapshot settinges</h3>

 <form class="form-horizontal">
<fieldset>
<!-- File Button -->
<div class="control-group">
<label for="filebutton" class="control-label">Snapshot every</label>
<div class="controls">
    <select id="selectbasic" name="selectbasic"  class="input-large select-large">
      <option>15 minutes</option>
      <option>1 hour</option>
      <option>4 hours</option>
      <option>12 hours</option>
      <option>1 day</option>
      <option>1 week</option>
      <option>1 month</option>
    </select>
	    <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">Save</button>
</div>
</div>
</fieldset>
</form>
